attributes.action: Introduce a bursary to help pay for uniform & equipment in year 10 and 11.
attributes.additional_details: So people who are struggling can still afford new uniform and new equipment. Especially in year 10 and 11 because that's when you need the most equipment leading up to your GCSE exams.
attributes.background: I'm a year 10 student with my active citizenship class. We are trying to help people who struggle paying for equipment and uniform.

rejection.details:
We can't publish petitions when the request is something that's already happening or something that has been announced since you started your petition.

Schools must follow legal guidance on the cost of school uniforms which includes making sure they’re affordable. Some schools may already offer support, and local councils may also be able to offer support. Contact your local council to find out if there is support in your area: https://www.gov.uk/find-local-council
